name: batch-image-renamer
title: Batch Image Renamer
description: Rename multiple images with customizable patterns
content:
Overview

This application renames multiple image files in a directory using customizable naming patterns. Perfect for organizing photo collections and standardizing file names.

Features

  • Rename images with sequential numbering
  • Custom naming patterns using {n} for numbers
  • Filter by file extension
  • Preserves original file extensions
  • Safe renaming with conflict detection

Parameters

  • Input Directory: Select a stash folder containing images to rename
  • Pattern: Default pattern is 'vacation_{n}' (use {n} for sequential numbers)

Output

Images are renamed in place within the same directory following the specified pattern.

Use Cases

  • Organizing photo collections with consistent naming
  • Preparing images for batch processing
  • Standardizing file names for web galleries
  • Sequential numbering for image sequences
command: rm -rf prod_apps_clone 2>/dev/null || true && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps_clone && python prod_apps_clone/python/batch_image_renamer.py "${inputDir}" -p "${pattern}" -s 1
